title: Group Therapy: It was "God's Plan"
description: Kathleen calls in to tell us a strange story of how her husband is asking her to forgive him for cheating because he feels like it was "God's Plan" that he cheated because of what happened afterwards.  What should she do?
itunes:summary: Kathleen calls in to tell us a strange story of how her husband is asking her to forgive him for cheating because he feels like it was "God's Plan" that he cheated because of what happened afterwards.  What should she do?
